nodes.text: The Tinoon Station Storage was a Cargo Facility 2 located at Tinoon Station. The cargo facility became under attack by a pirate force consisting of Y-wings and a pair of Marauder-class corvettes Wraith. The pirate attack was repelled by Ace Azzameen who was delivering a probe to his sister in the Otana and had decided to help, for repelling the attack Ace was allowed to go without inspection.
